title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing branch management links
description: Remove Branch, PR creation, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface to create a cleaner, more focused user experience that eliminates unnecessary complexity and reduces cognitive load for developers
iWant: to have a simplified Development Task interface without branch management clutter
soThat: I can focus on core development activities without being distracted by unnecessary UI elements
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development link is eliminated from the UI
Rebase link is removed from the Development Task view
Remaining UI elements are properly aligned and spaced after removal
No broken functionality or dead links remain after cleanup
